Scenario1-D2C_Payment_Using_CreditCard_W.TC-1: GIVEN Valid CreditCard Details with token, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return Successfully Processed Payment.

Scenario2-D2C_Payment_STATUS_FOR_CreditC.TC-1: GIVEN Valid EnroleeId, ReferenceId, PersonId and ClientKey, WHEN requesting to make Payment THEN should return Successfully Processed Payment.
